title: Spice Things Up with Lauren Lapkus
itunes:title: Spice Things Up with Lauren Lapkus
description:
Kulap and SuChin have a check in before introducing a previously recorded guest interview. Lauren Lapkus joins and shares how she’s making her spice cabinet look cute AF as she incorporates new spices into her signature dish, junk. Plus, more SuChin sleep reveals, and deep dives into the best worst shows.

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

For a list and links to all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. 

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 


Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: Sponsor Links
